subject: Bug in JUnit module in NB?
msgSnippet: Hi, After fighting half an hour with Log4J module in NB, I found out that why nothing was done when trying to run the Tools- JUnit Tests- Create command. My
messageBody:
Hi,

After fighting half an hour with Log4J module in NB, I found out
that why nothing was done when trying to run the
Tools->JUnit Tests->Create command.

My classes were not public.

But in that case, I do not understand quite well the meaning of
the dialog window (with title "Configuration of Unit test generator")
that appear after calling the command.
What is the option Package functions for?
My classes were not public but they were in the (same) package and
the tree structure is correct.

I have the feeling I mix up something but I don't see what.
Could someone explain me?

Best Regards,

Xavier.
